Subjects: carols, of the Eucharist; Christ, attributes of
_description: A song of Christ, an Ear of Wheat — five quatrains (aaab) and burden (bb): ‘A blessid byrd as I you say / Þat dyed & rose on good fryday’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
On Cristis day I vnderstondAn ere of whet of a mayd
                    spronge…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…& betyn till his body was blody redeThus they bett Ihesu
                    owr det to payExplicit
OxfBal354.Facsimiles:
Early Manuscripts at Oxford University: Facsimile
                    of Oxford, Balliol MS 354.
         (http://image.ox.ac.uk/show?collection=balliol&manuscript=ms354).
